title: These piano lessons come with an actual keyboard and other extras
description: Learn to Play Piano Bundle comes with in-depth video piano lessons from a pro along with your own portable MIDI keyboard and speaker. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Learn to Play Piano Bundle comes with in-depth video piano lessons from a pro along with your own portable MIDI keyboard and speaker.
text: Deals Get piano lessons and a keyboard to practice on, all at a discounted price! Photo: Cult of Mac Deals Want to learn to play piano? This all-in-one bundle comes with everything you need to get started and excel. It pairs in-depth video lessons (taught by a pro) with a PopuPiano — an actual MIDI keyboard — and other extras. The bundle’s name says it all. And right now, you can get the Learn to Play Piano Bundle for just $294.99. This bundle includes everything you need to learn to play piano The piano is one of those instruments that looks easy to learn until you actually get started. The old-school answer was to find a piano teacher in your neighborhood. But have you seen how much a few lessons cost now? That’s on top of the price of paying for a keyboard if you don’t already own now. If you want a modern solution that will save you money and deliver quick results, online lessons offer excellent value. The Complete Beginner to Expert Guitar Lessons Bundle became a surprise hit with Cult of Mac Deals customers, and the Learn to Play Piano Bundle is an excellent option for wannabe keyboard warriors. A PopuPiano keyboard, a Chord Pad and a PopuSound Speaker The Learn to Play Piano Bundle pairs loads of piano lessons with a PopuPiano keyboard, a Chord Pad and a PopuSound Speaker, all for one low price.Image: Cult of Mac Deals As mentioned, this bundle lands you an actual keyboard to practice on in addition to other cool gear. The PopuPiano is a smart, portable and interactive MIDI keyboard designed for all ages and skill levels. Its keys light up to guide you through songs, and the smart sensing technology adjusts to your skill level. This little practice keyboard works with computers and smart devices. Plus, it packs a rechargeable battery, so you can take your lessons on the road. The Learn to Play Piano Bundle also comes with a Chord Pad to make playing harmonies easy. And the included PopuSound Speaker pumps out clear, detailed sound wherever you go. Piano lessons for players at any skill level Don’t worry. You won’t have to learn to play piano on your own. This bundle gives you lifetime access to some excellent online piano lessons. That includes Pianoforall, a collection of 204 piano guides on everything from memory tricks to playing scales and special walkthroughs for jazz, blues and classical piano. Other courses in the bundle dive into things like music production, songwriting and music theory. All course material in the Learn to Play Piano Bundle is yours for life, too. No need to rush. You can learn to play at your own pace. These courses are designed for players of any skill level. If you’re a total beginner, you can start at the beginning with lessons on beginner piano technique and practical fundamentals like learning to play by ear and read music. Save on the Learn to Play Piano Bundle Learning piano doesn’t need to cost an arm and a leg expensive. And it definitely doesn’t have to be stressful.  Get the Learn to Play Piano Bundle while it’s on sale for $294.99 (regularly $479). Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. html:
• Deals

Want to learn to play piano? This all-in-one bundle comes with everything you need to get started and excel. It pairs in-depth video lessons (taught by a pro) with a PopuPiano — an actual MIDI keyboard — and other extras.

The bundle’s name says it all. And right now, you can get the Learn to Play Piano Bundle for just $294.99.

This bundle includes everything you need to learn to play piano

The piano is one of those instruments that looks easy to learn until you actually get started. The old-school answer was to find a piano teacher in your neighborhood. But have you seen how much a few lessons cost now? That’s on top of the price of paying for a keyboard if you don’t already own now.

If you want a modern solution that will save you money and deliver quick results, online lessons offer excellent value. The Complete Beginner to Expert Guitar Lessons Bundle became a surprise hit with Cult of Mac Deals customers, and the Learn to Play Piano Bundle is an excellent option for wannabe keyboard warriors.

A PopuPiano keyboard, a Chord Pad and a PopuSound Speaker

As mentioned, this bundle lands you an actual keyboard to practice on in addition to other cool gear. The PopuPiano is a smart, portable and interactive MIDI keyboard designed for all ages and skill levels. Its keys light up to guide you through songs, and the smart sensing technology adjusts to your skill level.

This little practice keyboard works with computers and smart devices. Plus, it packs a rechargeable battery, so you can take your lessons on the road.

The Learn to Play Piano Bundle also comes with a Chord Pad to make playing harmonies easy. And the included PopuSound Speaker pumps out clear, detailed sound wherever you go.

Piano lessons for players at any skill level

Don’t worry. You won’t have to learn to play piano on your own. This bundle gives you lifetime access to some excellent online piano lessons. That includes Pianoforall, a collection of 204 piano guides on everything from memory tricks to playing scales and special walkthroughs for jazz, blues and classical piano.

Other courses in the bundle dive into things like music production, songwriting and music theory. All course material in the Learn to Play Piano Bundle is yours for life, too. No need to rush. You can learn to play at your own pace.

These courses are designed for players of any skill level. If you’re a total beginner, you can start at the beginning with lessons on beginner piano technique and practical fundamentals like learning to play by ear and read music.

Save on the Learn to Play Piano Bundle

Learning piano doesn’t need to cost an arm and a leg expensive. And it definitely doesn’t have to be stressful.  Get the Learn to Play Piano Bundle while it’s on sale for $294.99 (regularly $479).

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly.
